name: High Risk Leavers

name: Wordlist Matches

name: Free Email Domains
description: Free email domains are publicly available domains from which users can create email addresses for free.

name: Temporary/Disposable Email Domains
description: Temporary or Disposable Email Domains are domains used by email services that allow users to create short-lived, anonymous, or one-time-use email addresses. These services are commonly used to avoid spam, bypass account verification, or sign up for online services without revealing a personal or work email address.

conditions.value: mailinator.com, 10minutemail.com, guerrillamail.com, yopmail.com, getnada.com, moakt.com, trashmail.com, spamgourmet.com, maildrop.cc, tempmailaddress.com, sharklasers.com, temp-mail.org
